title: Aural set, voice and lute - second half of excerpt

content.description: You will hear an excerpt from a song for soprano and lute. The first portion, which consists of two phrases, will be played twice. Then the entire excerpt will be played twice. Before listening to the first portion for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: The second half of the excerpt features

choices.label: motivic imitation between the voice and the lute
consistent use of the natural minor scale

content.answer: motivic imitation between the voice and the lute

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in performed music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
